description: So this actually crashes your Wayland session when you try to close. No sound, bad scaling, garbage plot. 2/10 would not recommend. Probably mining crypto in the background. Burn it with fire... For real, I appriciate the developer churnning out games, but they should shoot for quality over quantity. Could actually be decent/fun if more care was put in to one or two of their games. Could be the next big game in the SuperTux lineup. I hope to see that.
Really fun premise, I enjoyed it very much!
Absolute banger game love the variety and designs
Also the game is very lame
